entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
